1015600.name: The Dead Tree of Ranchiuna OST
1015600.description:
Charming original soundtrack composed by Molo Dimolo.
12 tracks with around half an hour of total duration that offer varieted moods from mystery to melancholy.

01 - Don't Be Upset - Violas Only
02 - Good Spirits While
03 - Together Always
04 - As We Progress
05 - The Lynx Tale
06 - Protracted Preamble
07 - Dark Our Fantasies Are
08 - Betrayal
09 - Childhood Friends
10 - Fierce Determination
11 - Don't Be Upset
12 - Equally Judged

*Does not include a few short jingles and atmospheric effects from the game.
